siteDescription: Senior software engineer with a passion for product and strong background in full-stack development for web and mobile. I have 12+ years of experience as a web engineer across e-commerce (Eponym), Healthtech (ZocDoc), EdTech (Aktiv Learning and The Databyss Foundation), social (Skilltype) and commercial (Ogilvy). My skill set spans 0-1 prototyping, digital product launches, development on the Node/React stack, interactive systems (Unity), and I have an M.Sc. in user research for interactive systems.
title: Paul
Hine
intro: Product-Oriented Software Engineer with a background in full-stack development for web and mobile.
